a.style: font-family:"Playfair Display", Georgia, "Times New Roman", serif

text.tspan: Deaths in state-based conflicts per 100,000, 1946 to 2020
Civilian and military deaths in conflicts where the government of a state was a participant on at least one side. The
data counts only direct violent deaths (i.e. excluding deaths from disease or famine).
Source: OWID based on PRIO and UCDP
Note: The figures shown aggregate the sources' 'best' estimates for deaths in individual conflicts, or the mid-point between high and low estimates
where no best estimate is provided.
